price: Dan barang siapa Kami panjangkan umurnya niscaya Kami kembalikan dia kepada awal kejadian(nya).725) Maka mengapa mereka tidak mengerti?
arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: *725) Kembali menjadi lemah dan kurang akal, seperti anak kecil.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman nuʿammir'hu nunakkis'hu fī al-khalqi afalā yaʿqilūna
